review: I'm enjoying the Fire TV Stick. Much easier than using my laptop to connect to the TV!
author: Dr. Robert Brown

review: I like it so well that I bought three - one for each of my other tvs.
author: Sarah H.

review: I like it alot we usually want to watch movie I shows that we never watch before
author: Steven Pina

review: Love this thing, was a breeze to set up.
author: lisa t

review: Setup in 5 minutes and watching movies through plex app.
author: Darren Gamet

review: I am very pleased with this.  I find it easy to use and have much enjoyment from it.  More than met my expectiona.  On a side note I do wish Amazon Prime would have a month to month pmt plan.  For some of us on a fixed income the whole amount at once can be difficult.
author: Candace "Gadget Mistress"

review: Works so well!!! Wish it would let me mirror straight from my phone, though.
author: Hil F

review: I love the Fire Stick.  I had considered Apple TV because so many people were using it and when I found this product for such a good price I thought I would try it.  It meets all the needs I was looking for and it is so easy to go from TV toTV in different rooms.  However, because of the price I am going to purchase another one so I can have it on both televisions. The extra advantage is since I am a Prime member I have the options to watch the Amazon movies also!
author: Erin Hutchinson
